name: LoopyLoop
description:
LoopyLoop is a robot that was created with one goal : test products too dangerous for humans. But it wanted more than that. One day, humans created the Rewind Gun and the robot knew that it was it's only chance to achieve his dream. Follow LoopyLoop in his escape from the factory to discover the human world.

LoopyLoop is a robot that was created with one goal : test products too dangerous for humans. But it wanted more than that. One day, humans created the Rewind Gun and the robot knew that it was it's only chance to achieve his dream. Follow LoopyLoop in his escape from the factory to discover the human world.

This is our first game, and our first jam for Vincent and I.

Where: Levels Title : Aries Beats - Night Ride (80s Synthwave / Dark Synth Retro Electro Wave) Link : https://free-songs.de/dark-synthwave-2018/ ---- Where : Levels Title : scifi platformer asset link : https://opengameart.org/content/free-sci-fi-platformer-game-tileset Where : Last level link : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uyog-y5IOAg Other sound on freesound website other assets are made by ourselves.

Thanks for playing !
